comment: Pretty good guy, no longer teaches at KSU. His last class was insanely difficult at first, but he lightened up towards the end. I was paranoid I was going to get a low C, but ended up with an A.

He is a very funny and honest professor. Use Cengage-a online studying tool. if you come to class, DO ALL THE EASY HW, dont really need the notes just use powerpoint you def can get at least A-/B+. You can def learn a lot from this guy. Great teacher!

Dr. Jones is the Best professor. He is Very Reasonable, Laid back & loves to preach :) His test are timed & hard but you use the book or atleast the notes. You must go to class n read before class to survive. I made a B and busted my butt to get that. Take Dr. Jones. You'll love him too!

Dr. Jones was absolutely one of the best professors I've taken. He was very interesting and helpful. I took him for a December-mester and survived. The tests were hard, but he often let us use the textbook/notes. There is no way you could pass this class without the book and I'd show up for class. I respect this professor and he's an asset to KSU.

Took this class during Decembermester, and he changed the due dates and requirements of all of the assignments and quizzes, but ultimately was an easy A. After the first quiz that everyone failed he made the rest open book and gave us  a study guide for the final exam that we could use while we took it. Really unorganized, but go and ull make an A!

Great professor, easy class. He knows his stuff. Dont take the class unless you plan to do your homework. I only went to class on test days and still got an A. DONT buy the book! Read the online book, do the homework, and make an A!

This professor was very fun and extremely interesting. I really enjoyed his lectures and looked forward to his class. He has a lot of fun stories! He has a unique teaching style. His tests are hard though!
He rarely attended class. Also, he changed our final exam about 5 times before we finally had it, not very fun to not know until a week before. He also has strong opinions and is loud.

I took his summer online course.  Very easy, but learned a lot.  He simplified law in a way that Paralegal courses that I've taken did not.  Just read the chapters and take your assignments/tests in CENGAGENOW and you'll do fine.  You can take assignments multiple times to get the best grade possible. Responded quickly to emails and was nice.

He knows his stuff. Material not hard. Study fair and get an A. Very opinionated and loud...talks about race and gender a lot. He annoyed me a lot. I didn't learn a whole lot in class, just about "life lessons" (you'll get a lot of those). So...if you don't like black baptists churches...either take him online or don't take him at all.

Do the work and get an A. Hates white people and cant get over the past. And by the way....giving extra credit to people who are friends with you on face book makes you a loser. he bribed people to be frineds whit him. lame

Dr. Jones is an awesome prof. He is really funny and is always saying hilarious down to earth things that people normally wouldn't say. His tests aren't too bad, I didn't study and got C's and B's on the tests. 60% of your grade is easy weekly homework so it makes the class fairly easy to pass. Study a little bit and you'll get an A in the class.

The material for this class is what makes it challenging. It is a lot of material to go over, and the class is probably more difficult if taken online rather than in class. As far as Prof. Jones, he is strict about grades, but you'll do fine as long as you keep up with the assignments. He's clear about the coursework and teaches the material well.

Prof. Jones is Deffinatly something else. If your shy, sensitive to race, or lazy you may want to pass on this class. The book is a must; you will need to read it.All and all, I had an awesome time in class and now have a much better understanding of Law and Ethics. Very easy class if you just apply yourself(Turn in your work early and read ahead)

If you take offense easily, do not take this class! He pulls the race card and says some very rude things every class. His grading is unfair. TURN THINGS IN EARLY!!!!!!!!!!! He gives automatic 100s if you do. If you wait till the day before or the day its due he will find something wrong on purpose.

Easiest online class I've ever taken. Nothing hard about it. It is impossible to not average a 100% on the homework and you get 3 tries to take the tests and each try gives you the same questions. Just do the work and you should go into the final with at least a 95. The final was the same questions as the tests so it was also easy. Easy A!
Took Fall Online, I loved it. Everything is completely in text, very clear expectations, all work is done through Cengage; he has online video lectures so it is just as good as being in class.

I received an A in the class, but I was not impressed.  Anytime I messaged the professor, his responses were unclear. I read the chapters but the tests were very difficult. Beware of the ethics game.  It is worth a HUGE portion of your grade and there is little to no information to prepare you for it.

Took the class online he wasn't helpful to anyone. Material is ok you just have to read the book. Worked hard all semester and got a lot of A's on stuff and still got a C in the class. Tests are nothing like the material.

BLAW is a VERY hard class but if you want little stress and get an A take him ONLINE. It's really easy. Group Ch. assignments, 10 quizes, 1 case brief, 2 assignments, and a final. He's nice and helps you if you need anything. I took 5 classes this semester and his was the easiest.

I took his course online and it's pretty easy read the chapters and answer questions on them. A quiz on each chapter. But don't ask him any questions cause he wont respond to you and if he does it won't be what you are looking for. Easy class but not a great teacher.
This guy is a joke.  Don't bother taking him cause you'll only end up with a bad grade.  He's a harsh grader too.
HORRIBLE teacher!! Very arrogant and belittles students. AVOID this one!

I took his class online and he is SUPER EASY!!! 5 quizes, group chapter assignments, 2 easy assignments, 1 case brief, and a final. Out of my 5 classes, I did the least work in his. Recommended if you don't want stress from BLAW, cause it is a hard class.
Very easy course taken during the December mini-mester. A lot of text book reading, but worth it because he ends up going through test questions with you, but you have to pay attn to notice it.
Good professor and would recommend. Cares for the students and is good professor. Knows the law and enjoyed the class.Certainly not a boring class.

Not really a teacher, more like a preacher. None the less a very entertaining guy and class. Had him for Business Law and there was a good amount of work, nothing that is going to kill you though. An overall pleasure...

Terrible teacher. No...not even a teacher, more like a Business Law Guru with zero teaching ability and zero leniency with the huge loads of book work he will throw at you every week (which takes hours to complete). With long, useless projects and quizzes (which you may have to retake several times), its best to stay away. He'll ruin your semester.

This guy is aweful. A ton of useless work. On top of doing hours of work a week, you have to set it up a certain way or he rips your grade to pieces. In 1 instance, he made the entire class take an online quiz at least 6 times because he made the mistake of giving out the answers to it.  Brings his life problems into the daily lectures. A huge moro
He was great! He pretty much handed you everything. He was entertaining, you could never fall asleep in his class.

Great teacher but would NOT recommend anyone taking his class. We had homework due every week (a homework assignment AND a very difficult online test over Spring Break).  He changes how he grades assignments and will count off a ridiculous amt of points for doing (or not doing) something he may (or may not) have said. DO NOT TAKE!!!

I took his online class. I really like Dr. Jones, his method allows you to work at your own pace without doing things almost daily and requiring way too much from you. I am a mom going back to school, his class was perfect for me.

I took his online class. VERY EASY! There are 5 quizzes, one large assignment, and a final exam. Other than that you have to define terms and answer a few questions each week for a chapter. I got an A without trying that hard.
Great Professor! I did my fair share of work in that class and I recieved an A. He is a very energetic professor that will make you become interested in BLAW. I would take him again.

He tells you he doesn't want people taking his class because he is entertaining, but I'd recommend him for that very reason. Definitely a great teacher, and I feel that I learned a lot from the class.
Good professor. Come to class, show that you care, give a good attempt and you will do fine.
Hes funny, likes to have fun, class is easy, no attendence and**** i didnt really do mucch work and almost got an A

Very energetic, a little weird but he is entertaining. Cheat sheets allowed on test, gives bonus points, lets you out early alot. HAVE to read the book to pass, tests are pretty hard but if you read and do the optional online quizzes you should get a high B.

Very energetic professor, loves to get everyone involved in the class.  Online quizzes are easy since you can use the book, but in class quizzes/test can be fairly difficult.  You have to read the assigned chapters, if not prepare to be humiliated.  Very passionate and knowledgeable, but this class is definitely not for everyone.

He motivates you to study and get a good grade. If you do very well on your exams throughout the semester and your grade is clear you won't need to take the final. All his stories make class interesting and fun. It is easier to remember the material if you can relate to real life situations. Quizes in class, if you study the book you do fine.

Very lively and enthusiastic and passionate!Class is mandaded for certain days- so don't come unprepared- he will sense your lack of knowledge and eat you alive. He gets the whole class involved with his energy the way he bounds across the room. He is funny and helpful, just see him later.  He offers several O-L quizzes & extra-credit opportunities
the way he teaches is very interesting and fun, you can learn a lot from this class

Dr. Jones has passion!  He is incredibly enthusiastic about law, which makes the class very interesting.  He gets everyone involved in lecture.  Tests are very hard, but not unfair.  I would recommend him highly.

hes a really fun teacher. tests are no longer online, but you can use cheat sheet. He doesn't really give good instructions- the whole class was always confused about assignments. but at least once we asked him a hundred times, he explained better. I had to do alot of work, but I finished with an A. lots of people did I think.
Great Professor, very lively. Somewhat disorganized, but it doesn't hurt you.

Mr. Jones is an energetic teacher. He tries to make the class interesting by mixing up his teaching strategies for class. I would say that he is a good teacher. He gives A LOT of work. If you take him, be prepared to do lots of work outside of class. He does allow you to use a cheat sheet for tests, which helps out a lot!
Dr. Jones is the coolest.
He is very unorganize... changed his mind a lot and could never stay on task. I do not care for him.

Dr. Jones is great! All tests & quizzes online. Useful in-class exercises, very helpful at test time. Easy A if you just do the work and come to class. You will learn a lot in this class, and it will certainly come in handy later in life.

what an amaing teacher all the online quizzes and homework are done online and he gives you the site to work on it! also he is the best teacher because he challenges you and makes you learn life he tells alot of stories and is very entertaining he is my favorite professor in the school so far!
